author: Shelbie
title: Daily Afternoon Randomness (51 Photos)
text:
37 38 
I want to give a quick shoutout to one badass Chiver. This is Chris. A little over a year ago, Chris was in a motorcycle accident that damn near killed him. He recovered, luckily, and today is able to move on his own. Not everyone is so lucky. 
As we close week one of the ChiveFit Challenge , it’s made me realize how lucky I am. Know that if you’re able to move your body, that’s something to celebrate. So run, lift, dance, whatever – just make use of what some people can’t. 
You can show some support to Chris as he celebrates his way on his Instagram ! 39
